title: Perfect Information Monte Carlo with Postponing Reasoning
abstract: arXiv:2408.02380v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Imperfect information games, such as Bridge and Skat, present challenges due to state-space explosion and hidden information, posing formidable obstacles for search algorithms. Determinization-based algorithms offer a resolution by sampling hidden information and solving the game in a perfect information setting, facilitating rapid and effective action estimation. However, transitioning to perfect information introduces challenges, notably one called strategy fusion.This research introduces `Extended Perfect Information Monte Carlo' (EPIMC), an online algorithm inspired by the state-of-the-art determinization-based approach Perfect Information Monte Carlo (PIMC). EPIMC enhances the capabilities of PIMC by postponing the perfect information resolution, reducing alleviating issues related to strategy fusion. tldr: 该文章提出了一种名为Extended Perfect Information Monte Carlo（EPIMC）的在线算法，该算法是一种基于完美信息蒙特卡洛（PIMC）的策略融合缓解方法，通过推迟完美信息解决方案以减少策略融合的问题。EPIMC算法通过推迟使用完美信息评估器来优化PIMC算法，并解决了与此相关的新问题。这些改进使得在诸如桥牌和施塔特等不完美信息游戏中进行行动估计更有效率。
